Module kivakit.core.kernel
Package com.telenav.kivakit.core.kernel.language.threading.conditions

Class StateWatcher<State>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.telenav.kivakit.core.kernel.language.threading.conditions.StateWatcher<State>
  • public class StateWatcher<State>
extends java.lang.Object
    Allows a thread to wait for a particular state or for predicate to be satisfied by some other thread calling signal(Object).

    A thread waiting for a particular value calls one of:

    • waitFor(Object)
    • waitFor(Object, Duration)

    A thread waiting for a predicate to be satisfied by a value calls one of:

    • waitFor(Predicate)
    • waitFor(Predicate, Duration)
    Author:
    jonathanl (shibo)

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      private class  StateWatcher.WaitingThread
      A thread that is waiting for its predicate to be satisfied

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      StateWatcher()  

    • Method Summary

      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void signal​(State state)
      Signals any watchers if the state they are waiting for has arrived
      WakeState waitFor​(java.util.function.Predicate<State> predicate)
      Wait for the given boolean predicate to be true forever
      WakeState waitFor​(java.util.function.Predicate<State> predicate, Duration maximumWaitTime)
      Waits for the given boolean predicate to become true based on changes to the observed value
      WakeState waitFor​(State desired)
      Wait forever for the desired state
      WakeState waitFor​(State desired, Duration maximumWaitTime)
      Wait for the desired state to be reached
